meanings.sent1: The stridulously creaking door startled me in the quiet house.
meanings.sent2: The old, rusty gate swung stridulously in the wind.
meanings.sent3: The stridulously squeaking chair seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: The stridulously grinding gears of the old car echoed through the garage.
meanings.sent5: The stridulously buzzing bee flew past my ear, making me jump.

meanings.definition: In a manner that produces a shrill, piercing noise
meanings.sent1: She sang stridulously, hitting the high notes perfectly.
meanings.sent2: The alarm clock rang stridulously, waking me up abruptly.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed stridulously when it wanted attention.
meanings.sent4: The fireworks exploded stridulously in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The whistle blew stridulously, signaling the end of the game.
